QuestData.Title: Breaking the Seal
QuestData.Description:
<As you behold the relic, Thalyssra's voice echoes in your mind.>
You found it! But it is sealed away tight.
Search the room for a way to break those seals.
QuestData.LogDescription: Break the Seal of the Tides, Seal of the Earth and Seal of the Sky.
QuestData.RewardText: <As the magical barrier begins to fade, you hear the rustling of leaves and the clattering of mandibles just outside.>
